[[Mersin]], [[Turkey]] |- !colspan=2 align=center | MÄ°Y 1978-79 |- !colspan=2 align=center | '''[[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu#League participations|Season]]: [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]] [[1978â79 Turkish Second Football League|1978â79]]''' |- |'''League position:''' || '''Red Group:''' 6th |- |'''[[Turkish Cup]]:''' || Eliminated at R4 |- |'''Top goal scorers:''' || |- |'''President:''' || Atilla PerÅembe |- |'''Coach:''' || |- ! colspan=1 | \leftarrow Previous season
[[1977â78 Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu season|1977â78]] !! Next season \rightarrow
[[1979â80 Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu season|1979â80]] |} [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] had relegated from [[Turkish First Football League|First League]] in [[1977â78 Turkish First Football League|1977â78]] season. It was the second relegation of the team after 2 seasons appearances in first league (9 in total). The 1978â79 season was the seventh season of [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] (MÄ°Y) football team in [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]], the second level division in [[Turkey]]. They finished 6th in the Red Group. ==Pre-season== Preparation games: * 13.08.1978 - Konya Ä°dmanyurdu-MÄ°Y: 0-3. * 16.08.1978 - MÄ°Y-Konya Ä°dmanyurdu: 2-0. * 20.08.1978 - MÄ°Y-Zonguldakspor: 2-1. ==1978â79 league participation== The ([[1978â79 Turkish Season Football League|1978â79]]) was 16 th season of [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]]. The league was played with 32 teams, 16 in Red Group and 16 in White Group. Group winners promoted to [[Turkish First Football League|First League]] [[1979â80 Turkish First Football League|1979â80]] in each group. Runner-ups of two groups played a play-off game and winner promoted to first league as wellSee some details at [http://www.angelfire.com/nj/sivritepe/7879/CP2L.html Cem Pekin Archives]. Last two teams in each group relegated to [[Turkish Third Football League|Third League]] [[1979â80 Turkish Third Footbal League|1979â80]]. Mersin Ä°Y became 6th with 9 wins and 28 goals in Red Group. ===League table=== Mersin Ä°Y's league performance in [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]] Red Group in [[1978â79 Turkish Second Football League|1978â79]] season is shown in the following tableSee full table and results from [http://www.angelfire.com/nj/sivritepe/7879/CP2L.html Cem Pekin Archives]. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !rowspan=2|place !rowspan=2|team !colspan=4|games !colspan=2|goals !rowspan=2|points !rowspan=2| !colspan=3|home !rowspan=2| !colspan=3|away |- !
